ygData.subject: Smithing Guide
ygData.msgSnippet: Appreciate all guides on smithing.  Now most of us got brewing as a financial support, is there any faster way to use $$$ to boost the smithing skill ASAP?
ygData.messageBody:
Appreciate all guides on smithing. Now most of us got brewing as a
financial support, is there any faster way to use $$$ to boost the smithing
skill ASAP? When u guys mentioned smithing lvl something, how can I
interprete using skill lvl? Eg lvl 6 for smithing means how many skill
points? Any good sites which give good info on smithing? Thx.

Yiyang, I wanna join u at EK hunting spider leh. Got time can even fly
kite, hahahah.

Ziltus
